p: Twenty-one drugs with >20% CPE inhibitions, identified during the first round of screening, were used for the second round of screening. The drug name, catalogue number of Selleck, and the final percentage CPE inhibition of the 21 drugs are listed in Table S1, and the inhibitory effects of these drugs, when these drugs were added 1 h post-virus infection are also listed in Table S1. Seven drugs with percentage CPE inhibitions >50% were selected for further CC 50 and EC 50 assays, and the results are shown in Figure 2 and Figure S1 and are also listed in Table 1.
